cu.explanation_en: Setting the DRB ciphering to an invalid enum 'invalid' will cause configuration validation failure and prevent secure data transmission setup.

du.explanation_en: Setting the RF simulator server port to a string 'invalid_string' instead of an integer will cause type validation errors and simulator connection failure.
du.explanation_zh: 將 RF 模擬器伺服器端口設定為字串 'invalid_string' 而非整數會導致類型驗證錯誤，並造成模擬器連接失敗。
